description: Officers were called to reports of a serious assault in Scunthorpe on Saturday, police say.
title: Boy, 17, stabbed in leg in Scunthorpe altercation
title_page: Boy, 17, stabbed in leg in Scunthorpe altercation - police - BBC News
maintext:
A 17-year-old boy is believed to have been stabbed in the leg during an altercation with a group of men in Scunthorpe on Saturday, Humberside Police said.
Officers said they were called to reports of a serious assault at 18:00 GMT on Healey Road and said they believed the group of men involved in the fight knew each other.
The force said the boy was found in St Lawrence Place and was "thought to have sustained stab wounds to his leg" that were not life threatening.
Officers investigating the assault said a cordon had been put in place and asked anyone who witnessed the incident to contact police.
